name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Beijing posted that her internship salary was only over 100 yuan a day, and she had to work 12 hours a day, but her hourly wage was only 12.5 yuan. The parking space in Haidian District charges 16 yuan per hour. She said, "My hourly wage in Beijing is lower than that of a parking space."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The incident occurred in Hangzhou, Zhejiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 9, Qingdao, Shandong. An auxiliary police officer who was not wearing a police badge drove his private car against traffic and said to passers-by, "What's wrong with me driving against traffic?" The police reported that he had been suspended and would be dealt with seriously.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, Jiang Ruxiang, chairman of Xien Group, posted on Weibo that he brought 400 private entrepreneurs to Guizhou Tianyan for a meeting, but was asked to give the single room to government officials, and was surrounded by the police in the name of inspection when they were outdoors. Jiang Ruxiang said that Guizhou is his hometown, and he wanted to do something for his hometown, but was treated as a criminal suspect. This feeling is very uncomfortable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The internet celebrity who stopped Japanese tourists from taking photos at the Old Summer Palace was not only exposed to have a criminal record in the United States, but also had taught people how to evade subway fares in France.
